title: Projects
text:
Welcome! Below, you’ll find a collection of articles I’ve written and projects I’ve worked on. Each article explores a unique topic, blending data, economics, and thoughtful analysis. Check them out!



Data modelling and analysis on interesting and quirky topics!





Analyzing gameplay data to uncover patterns and insights.






Building a predictive model to estimate dating match success rates.






Exploring the factors that make up an ideal friendship using data.






A lighthearted analysis of gym trends among UCLA students.







Formal analysis and exploration on economic concepts





An analysis of economic stimulus measures and their impacts on various sectors.






Exploring the implications of free trade policies on national economies.






Insights into how economies grow and the factors driving growth rates.






A deep dive into rational decision-making in economics and beyond.

title: Contact Me
text: Feel free to reach out through any of the options below. I’m always happy to connect and discuss projects, ideas, or opportunities.

title: About Me
text:
Yashas Jain
Hi, I’m Yashas Jain from Singapore and am a passionate software engineer and data enthusiast with a focus on building impactful projects and exploring innovative solutions.
With experience in software development, data science, and research, I strive to combine technical expertise with creativity to solve complex problems. I’m currently pursuing my interests in statistics, big data, and machine learning.

title: About Me
text:
Education

UCLA
B.S. in Math of Computatons, Statistics & DS (double major)

title: About Me
text:
Interests and Skills

Interests:

Machine Learning and AI

Data Visualization and Analysis

Software Development

Research in Computational Methods

Skills:

Programming: Python, R, SQL, Java

Frameworks: TensorFlow, PyTorch

Tools: Git, Quarto, Tableau

Soft Skills: Problem-Solving, Collaboration

title: About Me
text:
My Philosophy
I believe in the power of data-driven decision-making and the importance of blending statistical rigor with real-world impact. I thrive on curiosity, continuous learning, and contributing to projects that matter.

title: About Me
text:
Beyond Work
Outside of academics and work, I enjoy:
- Playing with my cat
- Traveling to explore new cultures and cuisines   - Playing chess and solving puzzles

title: Welcome to My Portfolio
text:
Hi, I’m Yashas Jain
Welcome to my personal website! I’m a software engineer, researcher, and tech enthusiast passionate about building impactful projects and solving real-world problems.
Explore my portfolio to learn more about me and my work:

About Me: Learn about my background, interests, and experience.
Projects: Check out my favorite projects and work.
Contact: Get in touch or connect with me online.



Let’s Connect here
